title: Vue JS Developer
jobDescription:
Diverse Lynx is looking for Vue JS Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • As a Vue.js Developer, your role is to develop web applications using the Vue.js framework. Vue.js is a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It is widely used for creating single-page applications (SPAs) and interactive web interfaces. Here are some key responsibilities and tasks typically associated with the role of a Vue.js Developer:
  • Application Development: Developing web applications using Vue.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You create interactive user interfaces, implement dynamic components, and handle data binding between the front-end and back-end systems.
  • Component Development: Designing and developing reusable components using Vue.js. This involves creating custom components and integrating them into the application architecture. You ensure that components are modular, maintainable, and follow best practices.
  • State Management: Implementing state management using Vuex, the official state management library for Vue.js. You define and manage application-level state, handle actions, mutations, and getters, and ensure efficient data flow within the application.
  • Routing: Implementing routing using Vue Router to enable navigation and dynamic routing within the application. You define routes, handle route transitions, and manage the overall application navigation flow.
  • API Integration: Integrating with RESTful APIs or GraphQL endpoints to fetch and update data in the application. You make API requests, handle responses, and manage data synchronization between the client-side and server-side.
  • Testing and Debugging: Writing unit tests using frameworks like Jest or Mocha to ensure the quality and reliability of the application. You debug and troubleshoot issues, optimize performance, and ensure cross-browser compatibility.

title: Backend Developer (Go and Python)
jobDescription:
Job Summary:

The Backend Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable backend services using Go and Python. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in backend development, a deep understanding of unit testing, and knowledge of API contract testing. The candidate will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the delivery of high-quality, robust, and performant applications.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain backend services and APIs using Go and Python.
  • Collaborate with front-end developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
  • Implement unit tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
  • Perform API contract testing to ensure the integrity and compatibility of API services.
  • Optimize application performance and scalability.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to backend services.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
  • Mentor junior developers and contribute to the continuous improvement of the development process.

Skills and Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 4+ years of experience in backend development.
  • Proficiency in Go and Python programming languages.
  • Strong understanding of database technologies, both SQL and NoSQL.
  • Extensive experience with unit testing frameworks (e.g., JUnit, pytest, unittest).
  • Knowledge of API contract testing tools and methodologies (e.g., Postman, Pact, Swagger).
  • Strong understanding of microservices architecture and RESTful APIs.
  • Develop Reusable and Modular systems
  • Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
  • Understanding of security best practices in backend development.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
  • Comprehensive health insurance.
  • Professional development opportunities.
  • Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
  • Opportunity to work on cutting-edge financial solutions

title: HR Manager (PAN India) Urgent Hiring
tagsAndSkills: HR Generalist Activities,Payroll Management,HR Administration,Interviewing,Talent Acquisition,Communication Skills,Recruitment Management,Acquisition
jobDescription:
Job Title: HR Manager (New Delhi Location)


Department: Human Resources


Company Name: Dallas Ecom Infotech Pvt. Ltd

Office No . 132 , 1st Floor , U.S Complex , 120, Mathura Road, New Delhi, 110076. Near Jasola Metro Station Delhi.

Company website https://ecomdelivery.in/

Job Summary:

We are seeking an experienced and driven HR Recruiter cum HR Executive to join our dynamic human resources team. In this dual role, you will be responsible for full-cycle recruitment efforts as well as providing operational HR support to the organization. This position requires a strategic mindset, strong interpersonal skills, and a talent for identifying top performers.

Recruitment Responsibilities:

- Develop and implement effective recruitment strategies to attract top talent

- Craft compelling job descriptions and postings for open positions

- Source and screen candidates through various channels (job boards, social media, employee referrals, etc.)

- Conduct initial screening interviews to assess candidate qualifications and fit

- Coordinate and participate in multi-stage interviews with hiring managers

- Extend job offers and negotiate compensation packages

- Maintain accurate candidate tracking and reporting metrics

- Build and nurture a talent pipeline for future hiring needs

HR Operational Responsibilities:

- Administer HR policies and procedures across the employee lifecycle

- Handle employee onboarding and offboarding processes

- Coordinate and conduct new hire orientation and training programs

- Assist with employee relations issues, grievances, and conflict resolution

- Support performance management processes (appraisals, feedback, etc.)

- Maintain accurate and up-to-date employee records and data

- Oversee administration of employee benefits programs

- Ensure legal compliance with labor laws and regulations

- Provide HR guidance and support to managers and employees as needed

Requirements:

- Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field

- Minimum 3-5 years of combined experience in recruitment and HR operations

- Strong knowledge of recruitment best practices, employment laws, and HR policies

- Excellent verbal and written communication skills

- Proficiency with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and HRIS platforms

- Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment

- Strong problem-solving and decision-making capabilities

- High level of professionalism, discretion, and ethical conduct

To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications.



HR Shubham


Dallas Ecom Infotech Pvt. Ltd

Phone +91 878 918 4610

Website https://ecomdelivery.in/

Email karuna.ecomdelivery@gmail.com

title: Full Stack Flutter App Developer
tagsAndSkills: UI/UX Design,Api Integration,App Development,Flutter framework,Dart Programming Language,Flutter Sdk,Flutter CLI,Firebase Console
jobDescription:
Job description


"Urgent Hiring"


HIGHLY RECOMMENDED ONLY FOR:


  • PASSIONATE DEVELOPER
  • HAVING MINIMUM 1 YEAR OF EXPERIENCE

Job Summary

  • Full Stack Flutter App Developer
  • Minimum 1 Year of Experience
  • Noida Sector 132, India
  • Full-Time

What We Do


  • The SmartXaaS LLP develops the next generation world-class mobile marketing platform, building monetization, engagement, analytics, and discovery tools.
  • Our holistic platform approach connects app developers, marketers, device manufacturers, advertisers, and publishers to achieve greater business success. Thus finding, enabling, understanding, engaging, and monetizing their target audiences more effectively.
  • Over 30K advertisers have been running campaigns on the CPIDroid platform already and over 100K+ app installs are delivered monthly. We believe that the quickly evolving mobile advertising market with ad formats like in-app videos, interstitials, banners, and offer walls is just the beginning. We are eager to shape the future of mobile advertising and are looking for your support to make it happen.

Our Verticals:


  • App Store Optimization => https://asoeshop.com/
  • Mobile App Marketing => https://cpidroid.com/
  • Search Engine Optimization => https://seoeshop.com/
  • Digital Services Marketplace => https://elancemarket.com/

Who We Are


  • The SmartXaaS LLP is based in the heart of New Delhi and currently from Noida. Our team includes high performing entrepreneurs, economists, and engineers. We enjoy superior quality, high reliability, speed, and pragmatism.
  • We are focused on simplicity for our customers by leveraging deep technical know-how to build superior products and services.
  • Being part of SmartXaaS LLP means being part of a team with substantial knowledge and experience in the mobile ad tech industry.
  • Our team has a significant entrepreneurial background.
  • Working at CPIDroid is one of the most exciting startup job opportunities in New Delhi & Noida today.

Responsibilities and Duties

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and objectives.
  • Develop and implement mobile applications using the Flutter framework.
  • Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
  • Optimize app performance and ensure compatibility across various devices.
  • Troubleshoot and debug issues to maintain app stability.
  • Stay updated on Flutter and mobile development trends.
  • Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders.

Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications

Skill Set:

  • Dart Programming Language
  • Flutter Framework
  • UI/UX Design
  • API Integration
  • State Management
  • Firebase Integration
  • Testing & Debugging
  • Git Version Control (BitBucket or GitHub)
  • Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
  • Understanding of Mobile Development Concepts
  • Problem Solving & Troubleshooting

Tool Set:

  • Android Studio
  • VS Code
  • Flutter SDK
  • Flutter Inspector
  • Dart DevTools
  • Flutter CLI
  • Tracking SDK (Appsflyer or Kochava)
  • Version Control System:(Git)
  • Flutter Packages
  • Firebase Console
  • Device Emulators/Simulators
  • Testing Frameworks:(Flutter Testing Frameworks, Mockito)
  • Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) Tools:(BitBucket Pipelines, GitHub Actions)
  • Design Tools:(Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma)
  • Package Managers:(Pub)
  • Analytics and Crash Reporting:(Firebase Analytics, Crashlytics)

Candidate Profile

  • You are passionate about programming
  • You have at least 1 year of professional working experience
  • You have written large amounts of quality code
  • You are an experienced Flutter app developer that has worked with modern cloud infrastructure
  • You are a quick learner and love to tackle challenges that are not easy to solve
  • You have fun taking over responsibility for projects and stand up for results
  • You are motivated to shape the future of a young startup
  • You like to work in a young but highly professional team.

Job Types: Full-time, Regular / Permanent, Fresher


Salary: 25,000.00 - 33,000.00 per month

Benefits:

  1. Free Tax Advice
  2. Travel expense
  3. Learning and Development
  4. Laptop
  5. Performance Bonuses
  6. Happy Hours (Festive food)
  7. Birthday / anniversary paid off (any one)
  8. Companies travel reimbursement
  9. Flexible Work Hours (Hybrid Work from Home)
  10. Work Life Balance
  11. Yearly Health check Ups
  12. Half Yearly Team Outing
  13. Freebies

Schedule: Morning shift


Supplemental pay types:

Commission pay

Performance bonus

Yearly bonus


Ability to commute/relocate: Noida, Uttar Pradesh: Reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (Required)


Education: Bachelor's (Preferred)


Experience: Flutter App Developer :1 year (Preferred)


Total work: 1 year (Preferred)


Language: English (Preferred)
